snippet: Complaints about mysterious transactions on iTunes are undermining the store’s reputation as the safest of online shopping environments.
abstract: Complaints about mysterious transactions on Apple's iTunes Store, and in particular its App Store, are undermining the store’s reputation as the safest of online shopping environments; illicit transactions and scams affecting customers abound; Apple says it is working to enhance security, and advises customers whose payment information has been stolen to change their passwords and contact their financial institutions.

byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and BRIAN X. CHEN

lead_paragraph: Complaints about mysterious transactions on iTunes are undermining the store’s reputation as the safest of online shopping environments.

headline.seo: Pressure on Apple Builds Over App Store Fraud
headline.main: For Apple, Pressure Builds Over App Store Fraud
headline.print_headline: For Apple, Pressure Builds Over App Store Fraud
